Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "The sandstorm's weakening, but it's going to return in 30 minutes.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Do your people have a weather system of your own?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Since your grand retreat, even Babylonia has not succeeded in deploying a single satellite. Do you think we could have one ourselves?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Live here long enough and you can tell the patterns.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Alright, let's bid our farewells here. Next time we meet, we'll be enemies.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'From your personal judgment, could you share with us a nearby location suitable for resupply or a safe retreat?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "If that's the case, thank you anyway...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "But we do have a temporary surveying point somewhere near, of course, only if you're willing to come.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'But your people would not welcome our visit.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Indeed. We'd only welcome Babylonian transport crafts with anti-air missiles.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Commandant's supplies are running low. We have no more options, and—", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "First, Watanabe is in our hands. Second, if we manage to get this info up to Babylonia, we'll get firepower support.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Man, you are one cruel dude Lee, doing something like this to someone you just met?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I don't want a word from you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "And unlike your soldiers and Constructs, we don't have that many resources to waste. Pointless sacrifices aren't our motto.", 4: '1'}
